Subject: {{PostalCode}} Constituent: Support for Iranian Community
Body:
Dear {{RepresentativeTitle}},

As your constituent from {{RidingName}} ({{PostalCode}}), I am writing about our Iranian-Canadian community.

Many of our neighbors have family in Iran facing violence and persecution. The regime shoots protesters and shuts down the internet to hide its crimes.

While foreign policy is federal, our province can:

1. Express solidarity with Iranian-Canadians
2. Support community organizations
3. Ensure services are accessible to refugees
4. Recognize the community's contributions

Please stand with our Iranian-Canadian neighbors.

{{UserName}}
